text.div:
Pregnancy intention values

Codes representing possible values for the Pregnancy intention element

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    CodeDisplay
    LA28438-4Yes, I want to become pregnant
    LA26439-2I'm OK either way
    LA26440-0No, I don't want to become pregnant
    LA14072-5Unsure
